Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and they will bat first. Australia are unchanged. Abdur Rehman replaces the injured Afridi and Junaid Khan replaces Aizaz Cheema.
Tanvir to Wade, (no ball) lands outside the off stump and it leaves him, late swing, it's a no-ball as well
Tanvir to Wade, 2 runs this was a touch shorter and he swiveled and pulled it to the on side, mistimed
Tanvir to Wade, no run cuts back in and he clips it down to square leg
Tanvir to Wade, 1 run drifts towards the pads and he tucks this one away to fine leg
Tanvir to Warner, no run a touch shorter and he safely leaves it alone
Tanvir to Warner, no run stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Tanvir to Warner, no run this one swings back in sharply, tucks inwards and traps him on the pads outside the line of the off stump
Junaid to Wade, no run close to being called a wide, lands outside the off stump and Wade watchfully leaves it alone
Junaid to Wade, FOUR runs outside edge this time, full and wide outside the off stump, reaches out and the edge drops well short of second slip and races to third man
Junaid to Wade, no run Umar Akmal has dropped it! Junaid squared him up on the off stump and he got a leading edge to point, Umar was behind it but couldn't hang on as he fell forward

Junaid to Wade, OUT well Umar Akmal needn't beat himself up for that drop! Soon after being let off, Wade chases a full and wide delivery outside off and drags it to his stumps, not exactly a wicket-taking delivery though, the shot didn't come off r
Junaid to Clarke, 1 wide drifts down the leg side and wide called
Junaid to Clarke, no run gets beside the line and he pushes it to the off side
Junaid to Clarke, 1 wide was that really a wide down the leg side? Thought I heard a sound, bat hitting pad probably as he tried to flick it
Junaid to Clarke, no run full and wide outside off and he drives towards mid-off
Tanvir to Warner, 1 leg bye tucks it away off his thighs to the leg side
Tanvir to Clarke, no run fuller delivery and Clarke gets in front of the stumps and defends with soft hands
Tanvir to Clarke, (no ball) he has overstepped again, left alone, two front foot no-balls already from a Pakistan left-armer - Wasim Akram-esque
Tanvir to Clarke, no run fails to out away the free hit, he makes room and forces it down to mid-on
Tanvir to Clarke, FOUR runs this was too full and straight on the pads, Clarke gets off the mark with a stylish flick wide of midwicket and mid-on
Tanvir to Clarke, no run thats more the line Tanvir should be bowling, this left Clarke just over the off stump, cramped him up for room
Tanvir to Clarke, 1 wide struggling with the extras here, this was outside the off stump and he safely left it alone, too wide
Tanvir to Clarke, 1 run drifts on the body and he clips it to square leg
Junaid to Clarke, no run fractionally short of a length outside off and he leaves it alone
Junaid to Clarke, no run beats him! This was angled across Clarke who was sucked in to the off drive, fuller delivery, nearly took the edge
Junaid to Clarke, 1 wide yet another wide, down the leg side this time, both seamers struggling a bit
Junaid to Clarke, FOUR runs that was spanked past the covers, half volley wide outside the off stump and Clarke ensured he was well across to meet the pitch of the ball, mid-off dived in vain

Junaid to Clarke, no run appeal for an lbw and he's been given not out, Misbah is not reviewing it and wisely so, it landed on the off stump and didn't move away, Clarke was forward and he was trapped on the front pad, that looked like clearing the
Junaid to Clarke, no run slightly short and he punches it to the off side
Junaid to Clarke, 1 run drifts on the body and he tucks it down to fine leg
Tanvir to Clarke, 3 runs well fielded on the boundary, tucked off the pads and midwicket (Shafiq) gives chase and times his dive well at the boundary to pull it back
Tanvir to Warner, no run keeps it nice and straight and he gets behind the line and knocks it back to the bowler
Tanvir to Warner, no run behind the line and he gets an inside edge to the on side
Tanvir to Warner, no run stays beside the line and knocks it to the off side
Tanvir to Warner, no run nips back in and he stays behind the line and knocks it to the off side
Tanvir to Warner, no run keeps it straight on the stumps and he defends down the track
Junaid to Clarke, 3 runs defensive push through the on side, timed well enough to beat mid-on and the fielder does well to give chase
Junaid to Warner, no run delivers from slightly wide of the crease, keeps it straight and Warner knocks it back to the bowler
Junaid to Warner, no run oh well he induces another inside edge, luckily for Warner he drags it onto his boot
Junaid to Warner, no run good length outside the off stump and he stays back and defends
Junaid to Warner, no run comes from wide of the crease again and Warner steers it straight to Umar Akmal at point
Junaid to Warner, 1 leg bye nudged away off the pads to the on side, and Warner is still not off the mark
Tanvir to Warner, 1 leg bye tries to flick and he misses it, clipped off the pads to the on side, still runs for Warner
Tanvir to Clarke, no run comes round the wicket, angles it in middle and leg and he clips it to mid-on
Tanvir to Clarke, no run delivers from wide of the crease and lands it full, luckily for him the drive went straight to mid-on
Tanvir to Clarke, no run slower ball outside off and on a good length, steers it down to point
Tanvir to Clarke, no run Tanvir bowls the bouncer, Clarke ducks under that one
Tanvir to Clarke, FOUR runs it was a fraction too short, Clarke read the length well and swiveled and clubbed it just over midwicket's reach, safe enough
Hafeez to Warner, no run bowls it flat and on a good length, Warner stabs at it and nearly carries all the way to cover
Hafeez to Warner, no run hint of turn, stays back and defends
Hafeez to Warner, no run quicker and skids through, he steers it to point
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run off the mark finally! Stops before delivery but strays on the pads, clipped wide of midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, no run slower through the air and worked straight to midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, no run chips down the track and checks his shot, clips it to short fine leg
Junaid to Warner, no run angles it inwards and he stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
Junaid to Warner, no run angles it inwards again and Warner stays right behind the line to defend

Junaid to Warner, FOUR runs bit too straight, Warner shuffles and clips it in front of his hips and exploited the big gap on the leg side, Ajmal gives chase but can't cut it off, this outfield is much quicker than Sharjah's
Junaid to Warner, no run close call for Warner as he fishes outside off and nearly edges to Kamran
Junaid to Warner, no run stays beside the line and taps it to cover, tells his partner to wait
Junaid to Warner, no run brings it back in to the left-hander and he slices it down to point
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run slower through the air and clipped own to mid-on
Hafeez to Warner, no run took the risk of leaving that one, the slider just sneaks past the off stump
Hafeez to Warner, no run makes a bit of room and he punches it down to extra cover, this one didn't turn
Hafeez to Warner, no run flighted on off and he gets forward to defends
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run flatter delivery and tucks off the pads to square leg
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he drives wide of silly mid-on
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run Rehman tosses it up on the off stump and he clips it down to deep midwicket
Abdur to Warner, no run flatter delivery and he clips it towards midwicket
Abdur to Warner, no run sharp turn and neat bounce too! Warner tried to flick it to the leg side and and failed to make contact
Abdur to Warner, no run gets right behind it and defends
Abdur to Warner, no run straighter delivery and he gets back and defends
Abdur to Warner, no run slight turn and he knocks it to the on side
Hafeez to Clarke, no run tossed up on middle and leg and worked down to deep midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run
Hafeez to Warner, no run quicker delivery and he comes forward and pushes it down the pitch
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run flatter and shorter and he rocks back and slices it to cover
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run tossed up slowly and Clarke uses his feet and works it to wide long-on
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run rocks back and slaps that one straight to extra cover and there's a misfield
Abdur to Warner, 1 run comes down the track and he works it down to long-on
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run slower through the air and he works it off his pads down to square leg
Abdur to Warner, 1 run stays back and punches it down to long-on
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run flatter delivery and pushed through the line to long-off
Abdur to Warner, no run stays back and clips it down to mid-on
Abdur to Warner, no run slower through the air and he works it straight to midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run Hafeez drifts towards middle and Clarke uses his feet and clips it round the corner to fine leg
Hafeez to Warner, no run stays back and punches it with the turn to cover
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run goes back at the crease and he clips it to midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, no run stays back at the crease and he punches it back to the bowler
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run pushes it with the spin to long-on
Hafeez to Warner, 1 run clips it against the spin to midwicket
Abdur to Warner, no run warner was forward and the ball skidded through and nearly took the edge, Kamran was quite confident but umpire Llong wasn't so sure
Abdur to Warner, no run stays back and clips it to the on side
Abdur to Warner, no run tossed up on the off stump and he defends
Abdur to Warner, 1 run goes back and clips it just wide of midwicket
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run tossed up full outside the off stump and he drives him through the line to long-off and these two have brought up the 50 stand
Abdur to Warner, 1 run tossed up and driven down the ground to long-on
Ajmal to Warner, 1 run comes round the wicket, gets across and taps it wide of point
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on the pads and worked away down to square leg
Ajmal to Warner, no run tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it to mid-on
Ajmal to Warner, no run flatter delivery and he stays back and punches it to point
Ajmal to Warner, no run cuts straight to point
Ajmal to Warner, no run goes back and punches to cover
Abdur to Clarke, no run tossed up ball on the off stump. Clarke comes forward in defense
Abdur to Clarke, no run how close was Clarke to getting dismissed? He rocks back and looks to cut it and gets an inside edge that sails over the stumps
Abdur to Clarke, no run defends it to the leg side
Abdur to Clarke, no run fuller ball outside the off stump. Clarke defends it to the off side
Abdur to Clarke, 1 run comes forward and pushes it to long-on for a single
Abdur to Warner, 1 run fuller ball on the leg stump. Warner turns it to deep square-leg for a single
Ajmal to Warner, no run comes forward and defends it to the leg side
Ajmal to Warner, no run drives it off the backfoot to cover
Ajmal to Warner, 2 runs finally the patience snaps! The slog comes into play now and gets a top edge and it just sails over mid-on
Ajmal to Warner, 1 run turns it to square-leg for a single
Ajmal to Clarke, no run fuller ball outside the off stump. Clarke comes forward and defends it back onto the pitch
Ajmal to Clarke, no run pads it away to the off side
Abdur to Warner, no run turn there as Warner looks to turn it away but gets an inside edge onto the pads
Abdur to Warner, FOUR runs short ball outside the off stump. Warner rocks back and smashes one past covers for a boundary
Abdur to Warner, no run comes forward and defends it to the leg side
Abdur to Warner, 1 run on the leg stump. Warner turns it to deep square-leg for a single
Abdur to Clarke, 2 runs fuller ball on the leg stump. Clarke looks to push it to the leg side and gets an inside edge to fine-leg for a couple
Abdur to Clarke, no run comes forward and drives it to mid-on
Ajmal to Warner, no run straighter ball that Warner manages to defend to the off side
Ajmal to Warner, no run flighted ball outside the off stump. Warner comes forward and defends it to the off side
Ajmal to Warner, no run pushes it to midwicket. Clarke doesn't want to take a single off a misfield
Ajmal to Warner, no run comes forward and drives it to cover

Ajmal to Warner, OUT and the long, long vigil comes to an end! Pitching on the leg and middle, hitting on the pad and struck low on the pads. Ticks all the boxes required to dole out an LBW decision. Ajmal is ecstatic. Warner is asked,by his captai
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run turns it to square-leg to get off the mark
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off and driven down the ground to long-off
Hafeez to Clarke, no run slow through the air and clipped straight to midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run chips down the track and driven just wide of the bowler and down to long-on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run driven back to the bowler
Hafeez to Hussey, no run gets forward and drills it down the ground
Hafeez to Hussey, no run gets forward and drives to cover
Ajmal to Clarke, no run comes forward and drives him down to midwicket
Ajmal to Clarke, 1 run uses his feet and drives him down to long-on
Ajmal to Hussey, no run very slow through the air and he pushes it softly to point
Ajmal to Hussey, no run comes well forward and drives him down the pitch
Ajmal to Hussey, no run wants to drive straight but gets an inside edge to midwicket
Ajmal to Hussey, SIX runs Ajmal decides it's time to generous and bowls him a friendly full toss, Hussey moved across and clubbed it across the line and sent the ball sailing over deep midwicket
Hafeez to Clarke, 1 run tucks it away wide of square leg
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run stays back at the crease and cuts him down to point
Hafeez to Clarke, no run tossed up and he gets behind the line to defend
Hafeez to Clarke, no run comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Hafeez to Clarke, no run stays back at the crease and defends with soft hands

Hafeez to Clarke, OUT Clarke's been given lbw and he is reviewing it, lands quite wide outside off and spins back in sharply and hits the top flap of his pad, umpire Llong gave him out and Clarke asked for it to be reviewed because it was a questio
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run turn and bounce and he goes back at the crease and cuts him wide of point
Ajmal to Hussey, no run flatter delivery and fuller, he clips him down to mid-on

Ajmal to Hussey, OUT Pakistan have struck with two lbws in quick succession! Hussey looked a bit surprised, he was a long way across his stumps and hence exposed the leg stump and a part of middle, the ball spun back in and hit him low on the pads,
Ajmal to Bailey, no run comes well forward and defends
Ajmal to Bailey, no run fuller delivery and he clips it to the on side
Ajmal to Bailey, 1 run gets forward and knocks it towards midwicket
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run flatter delivery and he punches it with the spin to long-on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run quicker delivery and defended in front of the stumps
Hafeez to Hussey, no run gets forward and steers it down to point
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run on middle stump and turned to square leg
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run stays back and clips it with the turn to long-on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run gets forward and gets an inside edge to the pads and rolls to the off side
Ajmal to Bailey, no run tossed up slowly and the ball hits his pads outside the line of leg
Ajmal to Bailey, no run tossed up outside off and he gets forward and defends
Ajmal to Bailey, 1 run slower through the air and clipped towards midwicket, Misbah dived a bit too late
Ajmal to Hussey, no run sharp turn from the rough outside off, Hussey wanted to play at it but the ball completely beat him
Ajmal to Hussey, no run how did that miss the off stump? It was the doosra and Hussey left it alone, Kamran was appealing - for what we don't know
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run goes back and cuts him down to cover
Hafeez to Hussey, no run gets well forward and defends
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run goes back and cuts him down to extra cover
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run goes right back and clips it with the turn to the on side
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and drives him to long-on
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run risks exposing all three stumps to sweep him, paddles it to the leg side
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run flatter delivery and he clips him down to deep square leg
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 2 runs friendly half volley outside off and driven wide of cover, wide long-off runs across and mops up
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run steers it wide of point and sets off for a quick single
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 2 runs bowls it flatter and he stays back and whips it down to deep square leg
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 1 run gives it a lot of air and he drives a low full toss to long-off
Azhar Ali to Hussey, 1 run drops it softly to the off side and sets off
Azhar Ali to Bailey, no run drilled back to the bowler and he dives and stops it, crowd thought that was a catch
Tanvir to Hussey, 1 run another easy single taken, Hussey drops it just wide of point and takes off
Tanvir to Bailey, 1 run too short and wide and easily slapped down to sweeper cover
Tanvir to Hussey, no run bowls a tighter line this time, cramps him for room and he taps it back to the bowler

Tanvir to Hussey, 3 runs nearly five overthrows! He drops it in front of point and sets off, there was a bit of hesitation but Bailey was home, the throw was wide and it nearly carried to the point boundary
Tanvir to Bailey, no run chopped towards point and a fine diving stop by Umar Akmal
Tanvir to Bailey, 1 run a touch too wide and driven down to sweeper cover
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 2 runs bowls that a bit too short, he rocks back and chops it with the turn to deep cover
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 2 runs too flat and short again, Bailey played a front foot pull to deep square leg
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 2 runs the singles and twos are flowing, this time he gets back and slices it behind square on the off side
Azhar Ali to Bailey, no run straightens a touch and he shoulders arms
Azhar Ali to Bailey, 1 run stays back and drills it down the ground to long-on
Azhar Ali to Hussey, no run pitches it up and he drives to cover
Tanvir to Bailey, FOUR runs and now a boundary, this was short and enough width on it for Bailey to stay back and slice it wide of point, third man had no chance
Tanvir to Bailey, no run gets across and pushes it down to mid-off
Tanvir to Bailey, no run much better, bowls it straighter and Bailey could only push it to mid-off
Tanvir to Bailey, no run simolar delivery, he goes back and punches it to the off side

Tanvir to Bailey, 3 runs Tanvir's not doing himself any favours by giving width like this, Bailey cuts but doesn't time it as well, Ajmal has a bit of work to do from third man and he does well to slide near the rope
Tanvir to Hussey, 1 run stays beside the line and chops him down to third man
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off and pushed down to long-on
Abdur to Bailey, 1 run gets forward and drives him down to long-off
Abdur to Hussey, no run stays back and clips it with the turn to square leg
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run tucked to square leg and they pinch a single
Abdur to Bailey, no run gets forward and drives on the up down to cover
Abdur to Bailey, FOUR runs this was a touch shorter and Bailey wanted to cut but ended up getting an outside edge to third man, no slip and Shafiq gave up the chase
Junaid to Hussey, 1 run good length on middle and leg and driven down to long-on
Junaid to Bailey, no run comes round the wicket and Bailey tries to drive and the ball nearly dribbles back to his stumps
Junaid to Bailey, no run tucks him up for room and he punches it down to long-on
Junaid to Bailey, 1 run gets an inside edge onto his thighs and the ball rolls to the off side
Junaid to Hussey, no run Hussey chips down the track and ends up drilling it back to Junaid who takes it one handed and nearly flings it back
Junaid to Hussey, FOUR runs he picked the gap in the field well, it was dropped short and Hussey swivels and pulls it high over square leg, didn't hit it too hard, used the pace of the ball
Abdur to Bailey, no run tossed up outside off and driven to the off side
Abdur to Bailey, 1 run turns away and he opens the face and steers it to short third man
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run slower through the air and clipped with the turn to square leg
Abdur to Bailey, no run risks moving across his stumps to paddle it against the turn, hits his pads but outside the line of the stumps
Abdur to Bailey, 1 run gets forward and clips it to midwicket
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and drives to long-on
Junaid to Hussey, no run good aggression from Junaid! Hussey was down the track and he drove it firmly down the track, Junaid picked up and nearly flung it back
Junaid to Hussey, no run beats him with a jaffa, lovely line and length, Hussey nearly got an edge to the keeper
Junaid to Hussey, no run comes forward and punches it to the off side
Junaid to Hussey, no run on the pads and he fails to clip it away, that's four dot balls
Junaid to Hussey, 1 run drops it a bit short and he plays a short arm pull along the ground to deep midwicket
Junaid to Bailey, no run comes round the wicket and tucks him up for room, he chops it to the off side
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run stays back and he punches it towards long-on
Abdur to Bailey, no run beaten in flight and turn and Kamran whips off the bails, lovely delivery from round the wicket, Bailey drags his back foot back and the third umpire takes a look
Abdur to Bailey, FOUR runs outside edge and no slip! This one keeps a bit low and Bailey gets a thin edge that beats the keeper and short third man
Abdur to Bailey, no run tossed up and he gets forward and drives straight to cover
Abdur to Bailey, no run stays back and defends down the track
Abdur to Bailey, no run squares him up with the turn but he manages to block it out
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run flatter delivery and he tucks it down to square leg
Hafeez to Bailey, no run very slow through the air, he waits for it to come to him and chops it down the track
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run stays back and clips it down to midwicket
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to mid-on
Hafeez to Bailey, 1 run goes back and clips with the turn to mid-on
Hafeez to Hussey, no run flatter delivery and he punches it firmly to cover
Abdur to Bailey, OUT soft dismissal! Rehman tossed it up on middle and off and Bailey was looking to chip it to the on side but ended up spooning it back to the bowler
Abdur to Maxwell, no run leading edge and it just drops short of cover!
Abdur to Maxwell, no run
Abdur to Maxwell, 1 run waits for it and steers it down to point to get off the mark
Abdur to Hussey, 1 run tossed up and driven down to square leg
Abdur to Maxwell, no run tossed up on middle and off and drilled down the track
Tanvir to Christian, 2 runs comes round the wicket and he pulls a short one along the ground to deep square leg
Tanvir to Christian, 1 run fuller delivery on the pads and he works it down to square leg
Tanvir to Johnson, no run nibbles at it outside the off stump, Tanvir gets it to shape away at the last minute
Tanvir to Johnson, no run squared him up by one that nipped back in, hit his pads and lobbed to the off side
Tanvir to Johnson, 1 leg bye full on the pads and squirted away down to midwicket

Tanvir to Christian, (no ball) 2 runs it's yet another no-ball! He's being penalised for bowling too wide of the crease, his front foot was just outside the border line, chipped in the air to deep midwicket, good stop there
Tanvir to Christian, FOUR runs the free hit costs Pakistan a boundary! Tanvir bowls a low full toss on the pads and Christian shuffles and clips it wide of short fine leg
Ajmal to Johnson, 1 run goes back and punches him wide of Misbah at cover
Ajmal to Christian, no run teases him with a flatter delivery, he drills it back to the bowler
Ajmal to Christian, no run squared up by turn, nips back and hits the pads and rolls to the on side
Ajmal to Christian, no run keeps him quiet again, no room to free his arms, he punches it back to the bowler
Ajmal to Christian, no run Christian has no clue how to play him, tucks it off his pads to the on side
Ajmal to Christian, 1 run clips it to square leg and it will just be a single
Hafeez to Hussey, no run flatter delivery and he stays back and he punches it back to the bowler
Hafeez to Hussey, 1 leg bye floated on the pads and it skids through, hits the pads and rolls to the off side, there was an appeal but that was missing leg
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run made room to cut but ended up stabbing at it towards mid-off
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run chips down the track, checks his shot and drives back to the bowler
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run slower through the air and driven back to the bowler
Hafeez to Maxwell, no run clipped to midwicket and Misbah is alert to dive and stop it
Abdur to Hussey, 3 runs driven down to sweeper cover and Azhar does really well to give chase and pull it back before the rope
Abdur to Maxwell, 2 runs down the track and he gets an outside edge which luckily for Maxwell beats point
Abdur to Maxwell, 2 runs down the track and he lofts inside out over cover, well clear of the fielders
Abdur to Maxwell, no run down the track and he checks his shot and drills it back to the bowler
Abdur to Maxwell, SIX runs quite an extraordinary slog! Tossed up on middle and Maxwell was already forward and he slogged it cleanly over deep square leg, good bat speed there
Abdur to Maxwell, SIX runs back to back sixes! He was down the track to the pitch of the ball and he lofted it crisply over wide long-on
Junaid to Christian, FOUR runs bowls that full and wide outside off and Christian gets across and hammers it to deep cover for a boundary
Junaid to Christian, 2 runs chips it down the ground and it drops short and wide of long-on
Junaid to Christian, 1 run this was short and he fetched it from outside off and dragged it to deep midwicket, Christian dives and the throw is just wide
Junaid to Johnson, 1 run squeezes it out to deep midwicket for a single

Junaid to Christian, OUT that was a sharp catch by Jamshed! Christian fetched that from outside off and pulled it flat and fast towards deep midwicket, Jamshed ran across to his right and plucked the ball on the dive

Junaid to Johnson, OUT ends his spell with two wickets in as many balls! Junaid bowled that full and straight on the stumps, Johnson had a wild swing and missed it completely, crashed onto off and middle
Tanvir to Pattinson, 1 run cut wide of point for a single
Tanvir to Starc, 2 runs leading edge just clears Tanvir who leaps and stretches out his right hand
Tanvir to Starc, 1 run oh well overthrows! Full outside off and he pushes it straight cover, the fielder has a shy at the stumps but the throw was wide
Tanvir to Pattinson, 1 run pushes it down to cover for a single
Tanvir to Starc, FOUR runs take that! It was dropped short, Starc swivels and clubs it wide of midwicket and the ball races away, beats the sweeper
Tanvir to Starc, FOUR runs and Australia squeeze in four more! Streaky one though, swings and gets an inside edge that sneaks past the stumps and Ajmal at short fine leg

Had Pakistan taken their chances, they would have been chasing much less. 249 is surely going to test them in these conditions and Australia will feel they've put up a very competitive score. Join us at 10.25. It will be a shorter interval.
10pm: So Pakistan have spent four hours in the field, half an hour longer than they should have. Never easy finishing your overs on time in these conditions.
Welcome back. No change in the opening slot. It's Hafeez and Jamshed
Pattinson to Hafeez, 1 wide starts off with a wide and he slides it down the leg side
Pattinson to Hafeez, 3 runs on a good length outside off and Hafeez stabs at it but times it well enough to beat mid-off, throw from Christian was a bit wide
Pattinson to Jamshed, no run continues over the wicket, he stays back at the crease and defends to the off side
Pattinson to Jamshed, 1 wide another wide down the leg side, Jamshed tried to flick it away
Pattinson to Jamshed, no run shapes across him and he leaves it alone
Pattinson to Jamshed, FOUR runs drifts on the body and he easily clips it away wide of square leg, the outfield does the rest, nice use of the wrists
Pattinson to Jamshed, no run lands outside the off stump and he leaves it to the keeper
Pattinson to Jamshed, no run completely squares him up outside the off stump, he didn't know whether to play or leave it, nipped away and beat him
Starc to Hafeez, no run that was a boundary ball and Maxwell has done brilliantly at short cover to stop a certain four, it was short and wide and slapped away
Starc to Hafeez, no run fullish on the pads and clipped down to midwicket
Starc to Hafeez, no run keeps it nice and straight and he stays back and knocks it back to the bowler
Starc to Hafeez, no run good length outside off and he stays back and clips it to midwicket
Starc to Hafeez, no run good inswinging yorker and Starc appeals for a lbw, Hafeez played all around it but the ball was hitting him outside the line of leg stump
Starc to Hafeez, 1 wide pitches it up but down the leg side and wide called
Starc to Hafeez, 2 runs fetches a full delivery from outside off and clips it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket
Pattinson to Jamshed, no run bowls it straight on the off stump and he steers it down to point

Pattinson to Jamshed, no run given lbw immediately and Jamshed is reviewing it, pitched outside the leg stump, straightened and hit his back leg in front of the stumps, Jamshed consulted Hafeez and it was a good review in the end
Pattinson to Jamshed, 1 run fullish on the stumps and he pushes it down to mid-on
Pattinson to Hafeez, no run low full toss and he pushes it towards cover

Starc to Jamshed, FOUR runs lovely punch off the back foot, it was short and wide and Jamshed played that high on the body and sliced it past the gap between cover and point, Warner gives chase but fails to drag it back properly, the ball hits his b

Maxwell to Hafeez, 1 run full on the stumps and clipped towards deep midwicket

Having said that, a deserved victory for Pakistan. A crucial DRS reversal proved the turning point as Jamshed wisely challenged the LBW early in the innings and went on to score an entertaining 97. He should never have been given out in the first place. A
That's it from us here. It's been a really really long night. Goes without saying really. Catch the decider in Sharjah on Monday. Thanks for your mails. Cheers!
Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 38 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Nasir Jamshed, PAK
